titles: The Church militant historically continued from the yeare of our Saviours Incarnation 33. untill this present, 1640. By William Vaughan, Knight.
author: Vaughan, William, 1577-1641.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine for Humfrey Blunden, at the Castle in Corn-hill,

keywords: Church history --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
